name: shiny-stone
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a minccino into cinccino, a roselia into roserade, or a togetic into togekiss.
short_effect: Evolves a Minccino into Cinccino, a Roselia into Roserade, or a Togetic into Togekiss.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.
